title: Where was the leaver though?
body:
So I just got hit with leaver because my computer randomly shuts down (no idea why, honestly wish I knew), then spend more time trying to reconnect just to be blocked by rito.

I spend more time reconnecting than the game went for. 

RITO
DUDE
FIX YO CRAP YO

Why should I be shafted because of crap outta my control?

replies.body: Your computer is in your control  ;^)

Because at a point Riot have to consider the effect your issues have on other players. Connection or computer or life issues happen, everyone knows and accepts that. It is precisely why you don't get LeaverBusted for first or even first few leaves.

For you to have received a LeaverBuster you have to have had a recent or extensive history of leaves. If those were a result of pc issues, you have a responsibility to try to determine why the issue happens, rather than just continuing to ruin the game for other players despite knowing the issue exists. If those previous leave were afks, and it was only a benign reason that triggered the LB, then I think it should be pretty clear why and how you've used up your free passes.

You have to remember that your leaves, whatever the reason for them, don't only affect you, and while Riot is happy to give some free passes for occasional issues, consistent ruining of the player experience naturally has to come with some sort of consequence.
